requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
